nodes.documentation: Constructor

Modifier
Modifiers can be used to change the behaviour of functions in a declarative way.
This modifier checks to make sure the sender is the manager before executing the function.
nodes.name: isManager
addPromise
viewPromise
viewPromiseTitle
viewPromiseBuilderAddress
viewPromiseRecipientAddress
viewPromiseIndex

nodes.documentation:
This function is used by the recipient in order to reject the promise.
After the promise is rejected it is added to the rejectedPromises mapping.
This function will fail if it is called by an account that is not the recipient to the promise.
@param index The index of the promise in the pendingPromises mapping.
nodes.name: rejectPromise
confirmPromise

nodes.documentation:
This function returns an array containing all of the signed promises for one user.
@return An array containing all signed contracts for user.
nodes.name: viewSignedPromises

nodes.documentation:
This function returns a mapping containing all of the rejected promises for one user.
@return A mapping containing all rejected contracts for user.
nodes.name: viewRejectedPromises

@return A mapping containing all pending contracts for user.

params.index: The index of the promise in the pendingPromises mapping.

viewAllPendingPromiseBuilders().return: A string array containing all of the pending promises for a single user.

viewAllPendingPromiseIndices().return: An unit array containing all of the pending promises for a single user.

viewAllPendingPromiseRecipients().return: A string array containing all of the pending promises for a single user.

viewAllPendingPromiseTitles().return: A string array containing all of the pending promises for a single user.

viewAllPendingPromises().return: A string array containing all of the pending promises for a single user.

viewAllRejectedPromiseBuilders().return: A string array containing all of the creators of rejected promises for a single user.

viewAllRejectedPromiseRecipients().return: A string array containing all of the rejected promises for a single user.

viewAllRejectedPromiseTitles().return: A string array containing all of the rejected promise titles for a single user.

viewAllRejectedPromises().return: A string array containing all of the rejected promises for a single user.

viewAllSignedPromiseBuilders().return: A string array containing all of the creators of signed promises for a single user.

viewAllSignedPromiseRecipients().return: A string array containing all of the signed promises for a single user.

viewAllSignedPromiseTitles().return: A string array containing all of the signed promise titles for a single user.

viewAllSignedPromises().return: A string array containing all of the signed promises for a single user.

viewPendingPromises().return: A mapping containing all pending contracts for user.

params.index: The index of promise that is within the pendingPromises mapping.

viewPromiseBuilderAddress(uint256).return: The contract creator's public address converted to a string.

viewPromiseIndex(uint256).return: index The index of the promise in the pendingPromises mapping.

viewPromiseRecipientAddress(uint256).return: The contract recipient's public address converted to a string.

params.index: The index of promise that is within the pendingPromises mapping.

viewRejectedPromises().return: A mapping containing all rejected contracts for user.

viewSignedPromises().return: An array containing all signed contracts for user.

addPromise(address,address,string,string.notice: This function is used to create a promise. After the builder creates the contract, it will be added to the pendingContracts mapping of the creator and the recipient. This function will fail unless the account entered as builder is the same account that  is creating the promise.

addressToString(address).notice: This function helps in converting an address to a string.

rejectPromise(uint256).notice: This function is used by the recipient in order to reject the promise. After the promise is rejected it is added to the rejectedPromises mapping. This function will fail if it is called by an account that is not the recipient to the promise.

viewAllPendingPromiseBuilders().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the pending promise titles and contents for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllPendingPromiseIndices().notice: This function helps in signining promises. It returns all of the indices the identify promises for a single user and returns an array of unit.

viewAllPendingPromiseRecipients().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the pending promise titles and contents for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllPendingPromiseTitles().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the pending promise titles and contents for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllPendingPromises().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the pending promise titles and contents for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllRejectedPromiseBuilders().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the creators of rejected promises for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllRejectedPromiseRecipients().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the recipients of rejected promises for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllRejectedPromiseTitles().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the rejected promise titles for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllRejectedPromises().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the rejected promises for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllSignedPromiseBuilders().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the creators of signed promises for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllSignedPromiseRecipients().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the recipients of signed promises for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllSignedPromiseTitles().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the signed promise titles for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewAllSignedPromises().notice: This function helps in viewing promises. It prints all of the signed promises for a single user and returns an array of strings.

viewPendingPromises().notice: This function returns a mapping containing all of the pending promises for one user.

viewPromise(uint256).notice: This function is used by the involved parties in order to view the contents of the contract. This function will fail if a user not involved with the contract attempts to view it by using index.

viewPromiseBuilderAddress(uint256).notice: This function is used by the involved parties in order to view the public address of the creator of a contract. This function will fail if a user not involved with the contract attempts to view it by using index.

viewPromiseIndex(uint256).notice: This function is used by the recipient party in order to sign and confirm the promise. This function will fail if a party not involved with the contract attempts to sign it by using its index.

viewPromiseRecipientAddress(uint256).notice: This function is used by the involved parties in order to view the public address of the recipient of a contract. This function will fail if a user not involved with the contract attempts to view it by using index.

viewPromiseTitle(uint256).notice: This function is used by the involved parties in order to view the title of the contract. This function will fail if a user not involved with the contract attempts to view it by using index.

viewRejectedPromises().notice: This function returns a mapping containing all of the rejected promises for one user.

viewSignedPromises().notice: This function returns an array containing all of the signed promises for one user.
